name: Lil Polo Tee X Budweiser Royalty

metadata.name: Lil Polo Tee #1
metadata.description:
Introducing Lil Polo Tee, one of the 22 Budweiser Royalty artists. This Alternative Rap musician is from Harlem, NYÂ and has 500 NFTs available, allowing early fans to proudly represent them.

Core NFTs act as collectibles, letting holders portray that they were fans since the beginning. Rare and Ultra Rare NFTs will unlock levels of access to Lil Polo Tee and offer a chance for a closer relationship with them. This project and rewards are only obtainable by 21+ (or legal drinking age) NFT collectors. Terms and Conditions apply.
